channel.title: Staff meeting command [DELTA]

item.title: Staff meeting command [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @i_str_pk_i i str pk i
item.description:
@i_str_pk_i wrote:

I wanne make it so it doesnt only tele staff, but to a player here is my code :

if (command.startsWith("meeting") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { client castOn = (client) p; if(castOn.playerRights > 0) { castOn.toX = 1865; castOn.toY = 5347; } } } }

then i tried :

if (command.startsWith("meeting") && playerRights >= 3) { for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { client castOn = (client) p; if(castOn.playerRights > 0 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Infinity")) { castOn.toX = 1865; castOn.toY = 5347; } } } }
Then my code doesnt worked at allâ€¦

Read full topic
